WEATHER FORECAST FOR 24 August 2025
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 23 August 2025

A
 few showers may occur in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Kandy, Nuwara-
Eliya, Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Uva province and Ampara and Batticaloa
districts after 2.00 p.m.

M
ainly fair weather will prevail over elsewhere of the island.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
